title: How to Make Crescent Puff Smores

text: Preheat the oven to 325F/160C.  Melt two tablespoons of butter. Put a bowl of butter in a microwave and heat it up for 30 seconds. If your butter has not completely melted, then put it in for about ten more seconds at a time until your butter is completely melted. Depending on how many of these you make, you may need to add more butter later. Open and unfold the crescent rolls into individual triangles.  Start adding ingredients. After your crescents are unfolded, roll your crescent towards the larger side, folding the smaller side. When you get almost to the end, add one large marshmallow and sprinkle on some chocolate chips. Do this to each crescent roll. Roll each crescent into a ball. Roll the crescents into a ball so that no marshmallows or chocolate chips stick out. Brush the melted butter onto the crescent rolls. They will be sticky. Arrange the crescent rolls evenly on the baking sheet. You may need more than one tray, depending on size and quantity. Bake at 325F or 160C for 5 minutes. You can use this time to clean up the area. Let the crescents cool for about five minutes, then serve them while the chocolate and marshmallows inside are still warm and melted.  Finished.
